snippet: Many people who have spent 30 years in one career are deciding to undertake the difficult task of changing jobs to do something they find more rewarding.
abstract: Marci Alboher Preoccupations column observes many people who have spent 30 years in one career are deciding to undertake the difficult task of changing jobs to do something they find more rewarding.
lead_paragraph: Many people who have spent 30 years in one career are deciding to undertake the difficult task of changing jobs to do something they find more rewarding.

headline.print_headline: A Switch At Midlife, To Make A Difference
headline.seo: Switching Careers at Midlife to Make a Difference
